1230400.name: Bets on Pets
1230400.description:
This is the first chapter of a three-chapter game! The next two chapters will be updated within the year 2024!

"Bets on Pets" is an automatic pet battle game. In the first chapter, you will engage in a series of gambling-style battles in the tavern to earn money and repay your brother's debts. Each time you press the summon button, a pet will be summoned for both you and the enemy simultaneously. Choose the right timing for summoning to win in these seemingly fair battles.

Experience 10+ species of pets, 100+ different items, and 20+ unique upgrades in the game. Each battle is different, and only by winning it can you get all the coins in the jackpot!

In near future, the second chapter with a war game mode and the third chapter with an adventure RPG game mode will be updated. Stay tuned!
